summary: The Crips are a big, mostly African-American gang that started in Los Angeles in 1969. They're known for wearing blue and are one of the most violent street gangs in the U.S. With up to 35,000 members, they've been involved in serious crimes like murder and drug dealing. The Crips often clash with their rivals, the Bloods. Some Crips have been convicted of major crimes.
title: Crips
